text: Simon Friedli (born 22 July 1991) is a Swiss bobsledder. He competed in the two-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Switzerland Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Simon Friedli
